name: rsem-run-gibbs
usage: rsem-run-gibbs reference_name imdName statName BURNIN NSAMPLES GAP [-p #Threads] [--seed seed] [--pseudo-count pseudo_count] [--prior file] [-q]

options.description: number of threads which user wants to use. (default: 1)
Set seed for the random number generator used in simulation. The seed should be a 32-bit unsigned integer.
